title: Metabolite profiling and molecular characterization of NBAIR BSWG1: A potential strain of Bacillus subtilis against Fusarium oxysporium f. sp. udum

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Ruqiya S, Shivakumara KT, Aditya K, Kandan A, Sivakumar G, Prasannakumar MK, Pramesh D, Manjunatha C, Hosam O. Elansary, Mohamed A. El-Sheikh, Ihab Mohamed Moussa
